summary: Brett Ratner, who has faced multiple accusations of sexual misconduct, is set to direct "Rush Hour 4" at Paramount. The studio agreed to proceed with the sequel after reported intervention by Donald Trump on Ratner's behalf. Ratner previously directed all earlier "Rush Hour" films. The project is moving forward despite past controversies.

titles: Charting the influence of deuterium sources in hydrogen isotope exchange using a cobalt(III) catalytic platform - Nature
When substrates dictate the route: Deuterium source reshapes hydrogen isotope exchange pathways
summary: Researchers from ICIQ and Ben-Gurion University have studied how different deuterium sources affect hydrogen isotope exchange using a cobalt(III) catalyst. Their findings show that the properties of the substrates influence which reaction conditions are needed for efficient isotope exchange. This work provides new insights for optimizing deuterium labeling in chemical synthesis.
